Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:488#17#Chaos Witches} gather wherever souls are in turmoilâ€”or there's a lot of death.

They extract some kind of powder from those who died violently, then use it for their magic.

Dying is bad enough. You shouldn't also become an ingredient for a witch's spell!
I'll take this powder and bury it with full military honors. It's the right thing to do.
Please, get that powder back. It's a question of honor.
